homepage.header: Welcome to the 24. European ElfQuest Convention
homepage.subheader: from 26th - 29th of May, 2023 (Pentecost) in the youth hostel Wartenberg near Witten, Germany
homepage.entry: Also for 2023 a call resounds through forests, deserts, over steppes and snowy plains
homepage.welcome: According to this slogan you all are invited to come to the elven holt, to laugh, to dance and sing, to play games, to clown around, to vie playfully, to be creative and paint or write poetry or stories. As one tribe, new and old, everyone is welcome.
homepage.greeting: Enjoy the page for the ElfQuest Con 2023; Yours, the organization team
